caller_intent: Jessica followed up on a prior insurance transaction involving a new Kia, confirming a billing adjustment from $1700 to $662 and requesting assistance with setting up access to the online portal.
resolution_steps: Jamie confirmed the transaction details and acknowledged the billing adjustment.
Explained that the billing system requires three days to update and will transition to the new monthly payment.
Offered to send an invite for the online portal if Jessica preferred self-service access.
Agreed to trigger the portal invite setup for Jessica.
knowledge_required: Billing adjustment processes for insurance policies
Online portal setup procedures for clients
Communication of processing timelines for system updates
summary: Jessica followed up on a prior insurance transaction involving a new Kia, confirming a billing adjustment from $1700 to $662 and requesting assistance with setting up access to the online portal. Jamie confirmed the changes, explained the three-day processing timeline, and offered to send a portal invite. The call concluded with Jessica agreeing to receive the invite and no further issues.
